articles.title: Highest Batting Strike Rates At 2024 T20 World Cup - Times Now
articles.description: Windies allrounder Andre Russell finished with the highest strike rate at the T20 World Cup, followed by Australia's Marcus Stoinis. India's Ravindra Jadeja also finds himself on the list.
articles.content: Jadeja scored just 35 runs in five matches, at a dismal average of 11.66, but his strike rate was at 159.
